name: Beetopia (Melooon)
description: You are litrally a bee who is going somewhere and there is all this friggin stuff like wtf. Anyway everythings crap but it gets better if you know random trivia, click or tap space to fly (its flappy bird all over again!) heck what do you even say in these things! wuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuwuw
